verbs.description: [ARG0: son] [V: misses] [ARG1: penalty] but south korea beats uruguay 2 - 1 despite a second - half missed penalty from son heung - min south korea defeated uruguay 2 - 1 at seoul world cup stadium on friday evening a first victory over the south americans in eight encounters hwang ui - jo hwang ui jo korea seoul uruguay jung woo young seoul world cup stadium the associated press fernando muslera matias vecino south korea sebastián coates matías vecino jung woo - young sebastian coates
